languages.text: "Нет уж, раз речь зашла о моей компетентности — я выскажусь настолько пространно, насколько посчитаю нужным. На этом корабле был заведен определенный порядок вещей, и одним из его столпов было "Вольного Торговца не отвлекают по пустякам". Для этого есть сенешаль. Я всегда занимался внутренними проблемами, и уж конечно, когда до меня дошли сведения про скрывшихся культистов — взял дело в свои руки. Я в жизни не допущу, чтоб хоть одна сволочь, причастная к убийству Теодоры фон Валанциус, нашла убежище на ее корабле".

"I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the Seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about cultists hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."
languages.original_text: "Нет уж, раз речь зашла о моей компетентности — я выскажусь настолько пространно, насколько посчитаю нужным. На этом корабле был заведен определенный порядок вещей, и одним из его столпов было "Вольного Торговца не отвлекают по пустякам". Для этого есть сенешаль. Я всегда занимался внутренними проблемами, и уж конечно, когда до меня дошли сведения про скрывшихся культистов — взял дело в свои руки. Я в жизни не допущу, чтоб хоть одна сволочь, причастная к убийству Теодоры фон Валанциус, нашла убежище на ее корабле".

traits.locale_text: "I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about pirates hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我并不打算加快速度。既然我的能力受到了质疑，那我会尽我所能，把这个问题说清楚，直到我认为合适为止。这艘船上的一切事务都有着既定的秩序，而所有事务的核心原则之一，就是保证行商浪人的注意力不会被琐碎的事情干扰。总领的任务就是确保这一点。我始终都会亲自处理各种内部问题，因此当我收到报告，说异端分子躲在底层甲板时，我立刻便处理了这件事情。只要我还活着，那群谋杀了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的人渣，就别想在她的船上找到任何藏身之处。”
languages.original_text: "I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the Seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about cultists hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."

traits.locale_text: “我并不打算加快速度。既然我的能力受到了质疑，那我会尽我所能，把这个问题说清楚，直到我认为合适为止。这艘船上的一切事务都有着既定的秩序，而所有事务的核心原则之一，就是保证行商浪人的注意力不会被琐碎的事情干扰。总领的任务就是确保这一点。我始终都会亲自处理各种内部问题，因此当我收到报告，说海盗躲在底层甲板时，我立刻便处理了这件事情。只要我还活着，那群谋杀了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的人渣，就别想在她的船上找到任何藏身之处。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No voy a darme prisa. Puesto que mi competencia ha sido puesta en entredicho, hablaré el tiempo que estime necesario. Hay un orden establecido para las cosas en esta nave y uno de los pilares del sistema es que no se distraiga a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente con nimiedades. Le corresponde al Senescal ocuparse de estas situaciones. Siempre me he ocupado personalmente de los asuntos internos, así que en cuanto me enteré de que había cultistas en las cubiertas inferiores tomé cartas en el asunto. Mientras viva, ni uno de los rufianes que asesinaron a Theodora von Valancius podrán refugiarse en su nave».
languages.original_text: "I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the Seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about cultists hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."

traits.locale_text: «No voy a darme prisa. Puesto que mi competencia ha sido puesta en entredicho, hablaré el tiempo que estime necesario. Hay un orden establecido para las cosas en esta nave y uno de los pilares del sistema es que no se distraiga a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente con nimiedades. Le corresponde al Senescal ocuparse de estas situaciones. Siempre me he ocupado personalmente de los asuntos internos, así que en cuanto me enteré de que había piratas en las cubiertas inferiores tomé cartas en el asunto. Mientras viva, ni uno de los rufianes que asesinaron a Theodora von Valancius podrán refugiarse en su nave».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「急ぎはしません…我が力量が吟味されているのであれば、適当と思うことをお話しましょう。この船での物事の進め方には確立された秩序があり、そのシステムの柱のひとつは、自由開拓者の注意が些細なことでそらされないようにすることがあります。それを確実にするのが家令長の役割なのです。我は常に内部の問題に対処してきました。ゆえにもちろん、下層デッキに教団が潜んでいるという情報を得たときは、我がその問題に対処しました。我が生きている限り、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスを殺害した害虫の一匹たりとも、彼女の船に逃げ込むことはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the Seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about cultists hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."

traits.locale_text: 「急ぎはしません…我が力量が吟味されているのであれば、適当と思うことをお話しましょう。この船での物事の進め方には確立された秩序があり、そのシステムの柱のひとつは、自由開拓者の注意が些細なことでそらされないようにすることがあります。それを確実にするのが家令長の役割なのです。我は常に内部の問題に対処してきました。ゆえにもちろん、下層デッキに教団が潜んでいるという情報を得たときは、我がその問題に対処しました。我が生きている限り、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスを殺害した害虫の一匹たりとも、彼女の船に逃げ込むことはないでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde mich nicht beeilen — da meine Kompetenz in Frage gestellt wird, spreche ich so lange, wie ich es für nötig halte. Es gibt eine etablierte Ordnung, wie die Dinge auf diesem Schiff gehandhabt werden, und einer der Grundpfeiler dieses Systems ist es, dass die Aufmerksamkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nicht durch triviale Angelegenheiten beansprucht wird. Es ist die Rolle des Truchsess, dafür Sorge zu tragen. Ich habe interne Probleme stets selbst geklärt. Als ich daher erfahren habe, dass sich auf den Unterdecks Kultisten verstecken, habe ich die Angelegenheit selbstverständlich selbst in die Hand genommen. So lange ich lebe, wird kein einziger der Hunde, die Theodora von Valancius ermordet haben, Zuflucht auf ihrem Schiff finden."
languages.original_text: "I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the Seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about cultists hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mich nicht beeilen — da meine Kompetenz in Frage gestellt wird, spreche ich so lange, wie ich es für nötig halte. Es gibt eine etablierte Ordnung, wie die Dinge auf diesem Schiff gehandhabt werden, und einer der Grundpfeiler dieses Systems ist es, dass die Aufmerksamkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nicht durch triviale Angelegenheiten beansprucht wird. Es ist die Rolle des Truchsess, dafür Sorge zu tragen. Ich habe interne Probleme stets selbst geklärt. Als ich daher erfahren habe, dass sich auf den Unterdecks Piraten verstecken, habe ich die Angelegenheit selbstverständlich selbst in die Hand genommen. So lange ich lebe, wird kein einziger der Hunde, die Theodora von Valancius ermordet haben, Zuflucht auf ihrem Schiff finden."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « N'y comptez pas. Puisque mes compétences sont remises en cause, je prendrai le temps qu'il faudra pour plaider ma cause. Sur ce vaisseau, il y a un ordre établi, un protocole à respecter. Et l'un des piliers de ce système, c'est qu'on ne dérange pas {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour des affaires mineures. C'est le rôle du sénéchal que d'y veiller. J'ai toujours géré moi-même les problèmes internes, alors forcément, quand on m'a informé que des cultistes se cachaient sur les ponts inférieurs, j'ai aussitôt pris les choses en main. Moi vivant, les canailles qui ont assassiné Théodora von Valancius ne trouveront jamais refuge à bord de son vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the Seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about cultists hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."

traits.locale_text: « N'y comptez pas. Puisque mes compétences sont remises en cause, je prendrai le temps qu'il faut pour plaider ma cause. Sur ce vaisseau, il y a un ordre établi, un protocole à respecter. Et l'un des piliers de ce système, c'est qu'on ne dérange pas {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour des affaires mineures. C'est le rôle du sénéchal que d'y veiller. J'ai toujours géré moi-même les problèmes internes, alors forcément, quand on m'a informé que des pirates se cachaient sur les ponts inférieurs, j'ai aussitôt pris les choses en main. Moi vivant, les canailles qui ont assassiné Théodora von Valancius ne trouveront jamais refuge à bord de son vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır efendim. Liyakatim sorgulandığından mütevellit lüzum gördüğüm kadar konuşacağım. Bu gemide kurulu bir düzen var, bu düzeni ayakta tutan sütunlardan biri de Hür Tacir'in dikkatini önemsiz meselelerle dağıtmamaya dayanıyor. Bunu sağlamak ise Seneşal'e düşüyor. İç meselelerle ilgilenen daima ben oldum. Yani alt güvertede tarikatçıların saklandığını haber aldığımda bu meseleyle de bizzat ilgilenmeye başladım. Ben nefes aldığım müddetçe Theodora von Valancius'u katleden adilerden biri bile bu gemide barınamaz."
languages.original_text: "I will not hurry — since my competence is under scrutiny, I shall speak for as long as I see fit. There is an established order to the way things are done on this ship, and one of the pillars of that system is that the Rogue Trader's attention is not distracted by trivial matters. It is the Seneschal's role to ensure that. I have always handled internal problems myself, so, of course, when I received information about cultists hiding on the lower decks, I took the matter in hand. So long as I live, not one of the vermin who murdered Theodora von Valancius will find refuge on her ship."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır efendim. Liyakatim sorgulandığından mütevellit lüzum gördüğüm kadar konuşacağım. Bu gemide kurulu bir düzen var, bu düzeni ayakta tutan sütunlardan biri de Hür Tacir'in dikkatini önemsiz meselelerle dağıtmamaya dayanıyor. Bunu sağlamak ise Seneşal'e düşüyor. İç meselelerle ilgilenen daima ben oldum. Yani alt güvertede saklanan tarikatçılarla ilgili bilgilendirildiğimde bu meseleyle de bizzat ilgilenmeye başladım. Ben nefes aldığım müddetçe Theodora von Valancius'u katleden adilerden biri bile bu gemide barınamaz."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
